thread.section_title: St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful hotel
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel - Review of St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: cramsden
title: Wonderful hotel
text: This was my third stay at the wonderful St. James Court Hotel situated conveniently in the St. James district of central London. All the staff are highly trained, friendly and efficient and make you feel really welcome and comfortable at all times. I have stayed at other London hotels on previous visits but none can compare with the St. James Court Hotel for their truly excellent service and care.
